Data: 1.52 pm India win the toss and will have a bowl
Praveen to Wade, 1 run moving across the left-hander first up from a length outside leg, pushed towards extra cover and they are away with a single
Praveen to Warner, 1 wide straight and very wide down leg
Praveen to Warner, 1 run ending on leg stump after pitching outside it, tucked easily towards square leg
Praveen to Wade, no run much better line from PK, finishing around middle and off on a good length, tapped towards point
Praveen to Wade, no run decent start from PK apart from that wide, around middle again on a tight length, pushed away on the off side
Praveen to Wade, no run opens up as he sees the line is on leg, tries to work it away square, but it hits the outer side of the blade and rolls down the track
Praveen to Wade, no run angled far across the left-hander who lets it go
Vinay to Warner, no run back of a length and cramping him for room with the angle, pushed away

Vinay to Warner, no run pitched up now, but tight line just outside off and defended hurriedly, the ball has now dribbled away towards deep midwicket and they trot across for two overthrows, which are ultimately disallowed as the ball was deemed dead by then, despite neither the bowler nor th
Vinay to Warner, no run pushed on the off side, the line is just around off, and the angle is into the left-hander, tucking him up
Vinay to Warner, 1 run this time he waits a shade and nudges it towards square leg with the angle
Vinay to Wade, no run left alone outside off
Vinay to Wade, no run nippy length delivery that bounces a tad, he cannot work it away square
Praveen to Warner, 3 runs Warner gets some width and flashes at it, sending it scurrying past extra cover, long boundaries here, and it is eventually pulled back after what seems an eternity
Praveen to Wade, 1 run well done, drops it in front of square leg and sets off, a clean pick-up from the man running in might have made it close
Praveen to Warner, no run good delivery, just outside off stump on a length, Warner hangs his bat inside the line and is beaten
Praveen to Warner, no run this one nipped back in sharply from outside off, Warner was pushing forward and takes it high on the thigh pad off an inside edge
Praveen to Warner, no run back and across as he looks to work on the leg side but ends up nudging to midwicket
Praveen to Warner, no run left alone outside off
Vinay to Wade, 1 run 136.4 kph from Vinay just outside off, Wade is surprised as it nips and bounces across him, jabs it away to third man
Vinay to Warner, no run tucked up with the incoming angle, pushed away from the crease
Vinay to Warner, 1 run thick edge this time as he pushes hard from the crease, the back of a length ball flies to third man
Vinay to Wade, no run tight line this, right on middle, defended back to the bowler
Vinay to Wade, 1 run stays in the crease, and drops the length delivery on the off side from close to the body, they are through with the run by the time point reaches the ball
Vinay to Warner, no run he hasn't been allowed room at all so far, this time he has a swing as he sees this rare widish delivery outside off, misses
Praveen to Wade, no run too good for Wade, angled in on a good length, he comes forward to drive, it straightens after pitching and beats him totally
Praveen to Wade, no run pushed away on the off side

Praveen to Wade, FOUR runs shot! this will reach the boundary even on this huge outfield, pitched up a tad fuller, he gets a bit of width to comes forward and go through with the big drive, and it races to the extra cover rope
Praveen to Wade, no run defends an incoming delivery
Praveen to Wade, no run smashed off the front foot, he went after that one, but hit it straight to extra cover
Praveen to Wade, no run good length on middle, defended down the track

Vinay to Warner, OUT he's bowled Warner! they have not allowed him an inch of room, apart from one wide delivery, this one was pitched up from around the wicket, coming in on the stumps, Warner lunged at it and had a big heave, missed, and the ball rattled the middle stump, Vinay is pumped up
Vinay to Ponting, no run shaping away at 134.7 kph some way outside off, Ponting lets it go
Vinay to Ponting, no run moves a long way across outside off and shoulders arms to a good length ball that bounces nicely through to Dhoni
Vinay to Ponting, no run superb line this, at 138.1 kph, Ponting slightly uncertain whether to play at this pitched up delivery close to off, and allows it to go in the end
Vinay to Ponting, 1 run lots of bounce from just short of a length, he comes forward, drops it close to the pitch on the off side and gets off the mark
Vinay to Wade, no run this is probing stuff from Vinay, ending very close to off stump from over the stumps, Wade runs it to point
Praveen to Ponting, no run hangs in the air on a good length and comes back in sharply, but starts too far outside off and is left alone comfortably
Praveen to Ponting, 1 run sends it full on the pads, and Ponting flicks eagerly down to fine leg
Praveen to Wade, no run excellent line, shaping across Wade from leg stump, he stays in the crease and pokes at it, beaten
Praveen to Wade, 1 run hangs back and opens the face to run this one down to third man as it moves across him from back of a length
Praveen to Ponting, no run pushed back to the bowler
Praveen to Ponting, no run moving away a tad outside off, pushed towards cover
Vinay to Wade, 1 run Vinay is getting good bounce and nip, Wade stays back and runs this one to third man
Vinay to Ponting, no run hits high on the bat as he comes forward to a short of a length ball

Vinay to Ponting, no run it is overcast and Vinay and PK are testing Australia, this is not the Vinay who turned up in Perth, Ponting lunges forward as he sees it pitching on a length, but it rears up and moves away a bit to beat him
Vinay to Ponting, no run pushed off the front foot to mid off

Vinay to Ponting, OUT he's got Ponting now, Vinay has bowled much better deliveries than this one today, Ponting saw some rare width and went to punch it, it seemed to sit up a tad from short of a length and he ended up hitting it straight to short extra cover
Vinay to Clarke, no run 136.5 kph, bounce, bit of away shape from a good length, Clarke lets it go immediately
Praveen to Wade, 1 run runs it to third man for a single
Praveen to Clarke, no run moves forward and nudges the length ball to short midwicket
Praveen to Clarke, no run worked off the pad but there is square leg in place
Praveen to Clarke, 2 runs this time Clarke gets it past midwicket with a work off leg stump

Praveen to Clarke, no run huge appeal for leg-before, looked like an inside edge, else he was gone, yes, replays show a big inside edge, the ball came in quickly from a good length, and Clarke pushed well in front away from the body
Praveen to Clarke, 1 run nudged behind square leg
Vinay to Clarke, no run it is not the pace, it is fine but not threatening, but the bounce that Vinay is getting which is troubling Australia, Clarke is hit on the thigh pad now
Vinay to Clarke, no run pitched up, and he gets forward to push hard to extra cover
Vinay to Clarke, no run similar to the one that Ponting mishit to short extra cover, Clarke pats it away towards mid off
Vinay to Clarke, no run pitched up on the stumps, he motions forward and eases it to mid on
Vinay to Clarke, no run can't get it away, good length on middle, he opens up a tad but pushes it to mid on again
Vinay to Clarke, 2 runs not completely in control but gets the drive past a diving extra cover
Praveen to Wade, no run fullish, shaping away a bit, ending around middle, pushed from the crease
Praveen to Wade, no run no room at all, length ball on middle and leg, pushed down the track
Praveen to Wade, no run towards leg this time, but he has no pace to work it past midwicket
Praveen to Wade, no run comes forward and opens the face to push a fullish one to covers
Praveen to Wade, SIX runs whoa, that came out of nowhere, that is huge, Wade has had enough of this nagging line from PK, he puts front foot out and clobbers a length ball high over deep midwicket
Praveen to Wade, FOUR runs width, Wade cashes in, goes hard at the cut, and it flies over point for another boundary
Kohli to Clarke, no run gentle wide delivery, would have been called one had Clarke not reached out to pat it away
Kohli to Clarke, no run length ball pushed down the track, Virat dives to his right and stops it
Kohli to Clarke, 1 run eased down to long on for one
Kohli to Wade, 1 wide way down the leg side to the left-hander, Dhoni does well to get a glove to it
Kohli to Wade, no run angled across Wade who pushes to extra cover
Kohli to Wade, no run pushed off the back foot to midwicket
Kohli to Wade, 2 runs no pace to work with, even though he gets some width, he cannot time the shot as he looks to hammer it, gets it wide of extra cover in the end
Raina to Clarke, 1 run fired in fullish on to the pads, worked in front of square
Raina to Wade, no run too short from around the stumps, Wade makes room and bashes it straight to extra cover
Raina to Wade, 1 run better delivery, pitched up around off, he comes forward and pushes to covers for one
Raina to Clarke, 1 run shortish delivery, Clarke swings it away behind square leg off the front foot
Raina to Wade, 1 run pushed hard off the back foot to long off
Raina to Clarke, no run looks to guide a flat and straight one fine past the keeper but misses
Ashwin to Wade, no run pushes a tossed up ball back to Ashwin, in the air for a while
Ashwin to Wade, 2 runs turns across him from leg stump, he backs away and cuts wide of sweeper cover for a well-run two
Ashwin to Wade, no run pushes back a length ball to Ashwin
Ashwin to Wade, no run cramped for room with the straight delivery on middle and leg, punches it to the left of Ashwin who does well to dive and stop the single
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run nudged to fine leg off the pad
Ashwin to Clarke, no run another straight delivery from a length, Clarke stays back and hits it back to the bowler
Rohit Sharma to Wade, no run again Wade drives hard and finds extra cover
Rohit Sharma to Wade, 1 run shortish and spinning across, he makes room and gets it to sweeper cover
Rohit Sharma to Clarke, 2 runs
Rohit Sharma to Clarke, OUT Clarke takes on the flighted ball from around the stumps and lofts it straight to deep midwicket, part-timer picks up a crucial wicket
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, no run pushes a flighted ball to extra cover
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run guides a flat delivery to sweeper cover
Ashwin to Hussey, no run tight line on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Ashwin to Hussey, 2 runs flighted offbreak spins away outside off, he stays in the crease and cuts behind point
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run worked towards midwicket and Hussey charges across for the run
Ashwin to Wade, 3 runs bounce for Ashwin from a length, but Wade plays the cut superbly past cover, stopped just inside the rope
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run ending on middle from a good length, he moves well across and nudges behind square leg
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run misfield, cut shot goes through Virat at point as he winces in pain
Rohit Sharma to Wade, no run tries to cut this one but it bounces too much and beats him
Rohit Sharma to Wade, 2 runs Wade charges down the track, Rohit drags it short, Wade flails and an inside edge past Dhoni saves him
Rohit Sharma to Wade, FOUR runs he got hold of this one alright, short again, on middle, he backs away, opens up and thumps it over midwicket
Rohit Sharma to Wade, 1 run much fuller on leg, pushed in front of square leg
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs not short enough but Hussey has time to pull it through midwicket

Ashwin to Wade, no run straightish delivery, he pushes it on the leg side with a bit of an inside edge
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run sweeper cover is working overtime, Wade chops another cut wide of him
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run moves across to a flighted ball and works it to fine leg
Ashwin to Wade, 2 runs fired flat and wide across the left-hander, the cut is mistimed but worth a single still, Rohit's throw is wayward and allows one more
Ashwin to Wade, FOUR runs smack! Wade sees this one pitch on leg and instantly bends the knee to slog-sweep it to the deep midwicket boundary
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run that kept low, and Wade under-edged the attempted cut onto Dhoni's pads
Sharma to Wade, 1 run sharp, quick one fired in on middle and leg, he gets a lot of bounce and gets a leading edge on the off side
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs and this full delivery grazes the outside edge and goes between Dhoni and the wide slip
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs flat delivery cut through point for a couple
Sharma to Hussey, no run beats him outside off with a quick one that goes across with the angle

Sharma to Hussey, 1 run worked towards vacant midwicket, Dhoni immediately goes 'bhaag jaa (run), Rahul' as the bowler bounds after it awkwardly, the fielder comes in from the deep to keep them to one, Wade has to dive back
Sharma to Wade, no run cannot get the cut past point
Ashwin to Hussey, FOUR runs swept fine on the leg side
Ashwin to Hussey, 2 runs too wide and too short, he reaches out to slap it away, and they scamper back for the second
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run short-arm jabs a length ball through midwicket
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run jabs away this one on the leg side, that single takes Wade to 50, I don't see Haddin playing any time soon for Australia in limited-overs at least
Ashwin to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey latches onto the sweep, from outside off stump, and times it superbly behind square leg, no chance for fine leg
Ashwin to Hussey, 2 runs shot! this is smart hitting from Hussey, he is picking the gaps all the time, short-arm pulls a quickish length ball through midwicket now
Sharma to Wade, 1 run full delivery driven neatly off the front foot to long off
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run busy again from Hussey, pushes softly in front of extra cover and another run is taken easily
Sharma to Wade, no run lets a widish one go outside off
Sharma to Wade, no run beaten as he looks to make room for the cut, but the bounce is too much
Sharma to Wade, 1 run moves across and taps on the leg side for one
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs lots of width, the cut is on, and hard running gives them two more, this is a fantastic partnership, just what Australia needed on resumption
Jadeja to Wade, no run shortish one slapped away to extra cover
Jadeja to Wade, 2 runs incredible running, the throw was loopy from deep midwicket, and they make the second comfortably in the end
Jadeja to Wade, SIX runs clatter! Wade fetches a full one from outside off and hammers it over wide long on

Sharma to Wade, no run 96.9 kph and angled across outside off, beats him on the cut
Sharma to Wade, no run pushes a full delivery back to the bowler

Sharma to Wade, OUT inside-edged on to the stumps, Wade was getting beaten on the cut by the quick deliveries, he looked to open up and pull this time, the ball was not short enough, and he plays on, fantastic innings on ODI debut though
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run worked behind square leg
Jadeja to Hussey, 3 runs thick outside edge past slip as he pushes forward, Rahul dives but cannot stop it cleanly
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run worked with the spin through square leg

Jadeja to Hussey, (no ball) 1 run coming in with the angle, pushed past extra cover, Jadeja has overstepped
Jadeja to Hussey, FOUR runs low full toss, Michael Hussey is not going to miss out, bends the knee and lifts it over midwicket
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run worked to deep midwicket

Vinay to Hussey, OUT not the best delivery he has bowled today, way too short outside off, but Michael Hussey has shovelled the pull straight to deep square leg, he's given the run-rate a serious boost though
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run guides a length delivery very late down to third man
Vinay to Christian, 1 run drops this one on the off side for his first run in ODIs
Vinay to Hussey, FOUR runs clatter! overpitched, wide, David Hussey gets front leg out of the way and smashes it through extra cover
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run well done, waits for this one to arrive on off and runs it behind point
Vinay to Christian, no run pitched up on off, he defends it back to Vinay
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run makes room and punches through point from off stump
Sharma to Christian, 1 run pushes a full delivery down to long on
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run quick and not that short, he opens up to pull it down to long on
Sharma to Christian, 1 run guided towards point for a single
Sharma to Hussey, 1 wide fired down the leg side, he misses the sweep, Dhoni misses the take
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs worked for a couple to deep midwicket
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs smartly done, worked softly through vacant midwicket for two more
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run remains in the crease and cuts a length ball to point
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run runs the full delivery with an open face behind point, and the brothers are through immediately for the run
Sharma to Hussey, no run pushed back to the bowler
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run drives an angled delivery to long off
Sharma to Hussey, no run just past the off stump, oh, was that close, flat and quick delivery, slightly short, and he shaped up to pull, but was beaten as it straightened with pace
Sharma to Hussey, 3 runs worked square on the leg side, the throw would have tested them on the second, but instead a ricochet gets them the third
Ashwin to Hussey, SIX runs short, sitting up, and hammered over deep midwicket, need no invitation when it is that short
Ashwin to Hussey, FOUR runs tries the carrom ball, short again, David Hussey opens up and pulls again, gets two less than the previous stroke for his effort
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run third short ball on the trot, this time he will get only one through midwicket
Ashwin to Hussey, no run appeal for lbw as he is struck in front of leg stump, but that pitched outside leg
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run guided behind point from the crease
Ashwin to Hussey, 2 runs this is furious high-quality running, worked through midwicket and they hare back for the second
Vinay to Christian, no run misses the pull to a short of a length ball as it bounces more than he expected outside off, almost head high
Vinay to Christian, no run well fielded, leaps in the air to stop Christian's push to a very full delivery
Vinay to Christian, 1 run moves across and swings this one from middle, goes on the bounce to short fine leg
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run charges down the track and slogs a length ball to long on
Vinay to Christian, 3 runs goes hard at a pitched up delivery and slices it over cover
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run makes room as Vinay keeps it full outside off, slaps it away through point
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run sweeps from leg stump to fine leg

Sharma to Christian, 3 runs looks to slog-sweep over midwicket, but the inside edge races away towards the fine leg boundary, only to be stopped by Vinay with a big slide as he parries the ball to the chasing fielder
Sharma to Hussey, FOUR runs down the track and blasts it straight at the umpire, who gets out of the way just in time
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run dabbed away on the off side for a single
Sharma to Christian, 1 run makes room even as he keeps it full on middle and leg, inside edge behind square leg results from a big swing
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run guided through point for one
Praveen to Hussey, FOUR runs low full toss way down the leg side and he helps it past short fine
Praveen to Hussey, 1 leg bye similar delivery, not as much down leg as the previous one, and he is hit on the boot as he misses
Praveen to Christian, 1 run slower length ball now, he adjusts his swing to work it towards square leg

Praveen to Hussey, 2 runs dropped, good attempt by Rohit at deep midwicket, it was a leading edge off a low full toss, it looped in the air and Rohit grabbed it with both hands as he put in the dive, but it popped out as he hit the ground
Praveen to Hussey, 1 leg bye
Praveen to Christian, 1 run swung to fine leg, who has gone back to the boundary
Sharma to Christian, no run steps out but hits the full delivery back to Rahul
Sharma to Christian, 2 runs down the track again and works to deep midwicket for a couple
Jadeja to Christian, 1 run full delivery smacked to midwicket, the throw is from an off-balance Tendulkar, and allows them to complete the single
Jadeja to Hussey, SIX runs fifty for David Hussey as he backs away outside leg, Jadeja fires it in on a length, and he mows it over deep midwicket
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run pushed to covers for one
Jadeja to Christian, 1 wide fired in wide outside off, and called one
Jadeja to Christian, (no ball) 1 run and he bowls a no-ball now, fires it on on leg stump, worked behind square leg
Jadeja to Hussey, SIX runs low full toss and David Hussey finishes off on a high, clattering it way over deep midwicket

Australia were 35 for 2 in 11 overs when the rain came down. They have added 181 in 21 overs after resumption. Brilliant hitting from Wade and the Hussey brothers, on top of their busy running between the wickets. India's medium-pacers, especially Vinay Kumar, were nippy upfront, but their spinners
India have to chase 217 as per the D/L method. Don't ask me how they arrived at that figure
Tendulkar and Gambhir to open for India, Ryan Harris to start off
Harris to Gambhir, no run right on middle on a good length, pushed on the leg side but Harris gets to it quickly
Harris to Gambhir, 1 wide bouncing delivery but down the leg side
Harris to Gambhir, no run beaten outside off as he pushes at one going across him
Harris to Gambhir, no run back of a length ball dropped to cover from the crease
Harris to Gambhir, 3 runs carved over extra cover, Gautam makes room and slices the pitched up delivery over the in-field
Harris to Tendulkar, no run pushed off the front foot towards extra cover
Harris to Tendulkar, no run hurried into a defensive push to a straightening length ball
Starc to Gambhir, 1 run Starc starts off at 141 kph from a length, worked behind square leg
Starc to Tendulkar, no run goes across to an angled length ball and pushes back to the bowler
Starc to Tendulkar, 1 wide swings in sharply but starts on leg and carries down the leg side
Starc to Tendulkar, no run straightening on middle and leg, nudged to square leg
Starc to Tendulkar, 1 wide 144.8 kph delivery angled too far wide across the right hander
Starc to Tendulkar, 2 runs bit of width and he guides it wide of third man for a couple

Starc to Tendulkar, OUT he's gone! Ponting takes out Tendulkar, Starc pitches it up wide, not full enough, Tendulkar reaches out and goes for the drive, it flies low to Ponting's right, and the veteran goes down to take it safely, he is mobbed by his team-mates
Starc to Kohli, no run 146 kph length delivery left alone as it angles across outside off
Harris to Gambhir, 1 wide bowls it wide down the leg side
Harris to Gambhir, no run left alone quietly as it shapes across him
Harris to Gambhir, 1 run shot! Gautam leans into the drive but a superb diving stop from Warner at cover saves a few runs
Harris to Kohli, no run checks his forward push on the off side as this one bounces from a good length
Harris to Kohli, no run stays back and gets across to defend a pitched up ball
Harris to Kohli, no run lovely delivery, holding its line as it is bowled fullish outside off, Virat goes pushing at it and is beaten
Harris to Kohli, 1 run opens the face and runs this back of a length ball to third man
Starc to Kohli, no run goes reaching out to a wide pitched up delivery, similar to the one that got Sachin, Virat is beaten though, as he did not move his feet well enough
Starc to Kohli, 1 leg bye
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run almost another one, Rohit gets a wide and short one, and has a waft at it to get beaten
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run coming in from a length an bounces to strike Rohit on the thigh pad
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs reaches out to a short and wide one again, and it goes in the air towards third man, couple of bounces before he gets to it
Harris to Kohli, no run solid push from Virat, the pitched up delivery races to mid off
Harris to Kohli, no run he tends to come forward more often than not, and this time is beaten as he pushes at one holding its line
Harris to Kohli, 1 run this time he stays in the crease, and drops the shortish one behind point for a quick single, throw misses at the striker's end
Harris to Rohit Sharma, no run almost got him, just short of a diving shortish mid on as Rohit pushes loosely off the front foot
Harris to Rohit Sharma, no run this time he plays tightly towards mid on
Harris to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs opens the face and squeezes the full delivery between cover and point
Starc to Kohli, no run beaten outside off as he has flails at a bouncing short of a length ball going across him
Starc to Kohli, 3 runs goes for the pull, not timed well, but he will get three for his effort
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run eases a pitched up ball back to the bowler
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slashes at a widish one, and it flies down to third man
Starc to Kohli, no run gets forward and pushes a length delivery back to Starc
Starc to Kohli, no run too good, draws him forward with the fuller length, and beats him with the angle
Harris to Rohit Sharma, 1 run inside edge races past the stumps to fine leg as he goes for the cover drive, it nipped in a tad after pitching on a fuller length
Harris to Kohli, FOUR runs shot! full marks for intent to Virat as he lunges forward and smacks this pitched up delivery over extra cover
Harris to Kohli, 1 run drops the length ball in front of cover from the crease and they hare across for the run
Harris to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs and now Rohit, eases on to the front foot and swings the full delivery high over extra cover, one bounce for four

Harris to Rohit Sharma, no run superb comeback from Harris, Rohit was looking to launch into another big stroke, but the length was shorter this time, so he checked the shot, but it also held its line to beat him completely
Harris to Rohit Sharma, no run swing and a miss to end the over as Rohit fails in his attempt to slog over midwicket
Starc to Kohli, 2 runs lovely stroke from Virat, he steps out and makes room to power this one over extra cover
Starc to Kohli, no run moves across and pushes an angled length ball on the off side
Starc to Kohli, 2 runs gets across again and works from off in front of square leg, and will come back for the second, well done
Starc to Kohli, no run Starc gets low and gets a hand to this drive in his followthrough, the ball is struck firmly enough to ricochet as far as mid on
Starc to Kohli, 1 run pushed to mid off for a single
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run another inside edge to fine leg, Rohit pushing in slow motion with an angled blade
Harris to Rohit Sharma, 1 run worked with the angle off the pad towards midwicket
Harris to Kohli, FOUR runs the bouncer get big on Virat, but he swivels and goes hard at the pull, gets it in the air but over midwicket and into the boundary
Harris to Kohli, 2 runs leading edge flies past point wide of third man as he looks to work from outside off to leg
Harris to Kohli, no run hangs his bat at a widish length delivery and belatedly withdraws the bat
Harris to Kohli, no run and again, Harris is getting it to straighten after angling it in widish outside off, Virat goes reaching out again and misses
Harris to Kohli, 1 run chopped down to third man from close to the body
Starc to Kohli, no run advances down the track and makes room, eyeing the extra cover boundary again, but mishits it to mid off this time
Starc to Kohli, 1 run pushed softly in front of point for one
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run Rohit is looking very loose out there, pushes away from the body to one angled across, and is beaten
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs third inside edge for Rohit as he pushes with an angled bat, the ball goes in front of square leg
Starc to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs outside edge flies past a diving slip for four, Rohit sees it pitched up very wide and goes after it
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 145.7 kph high full toss close to off, he does well to open the face and guide it to third man
Christian to Rohit Sharma, 1 run loopy wide delivery first up, flashed hard on the bounce to third man
Christian to Kohli, FOUR runs shot! Virat is turning it on with some crisp strokes, drives hard in the ground, and it bounces over extra cover to race to the boundary
Christian to Kohli, no run
Christian to Kohli, 1 run opens the face to a short of a length ball and runs it to third man
Christian to Rohit Sharma, 1 run very awkward looking half-pull falls just short of midwicket as Rohit plays the stroke on one leg
Christian to Kohli, 1 run worked behind square leg off the pads
McKay to Kohli, 2 runs on the pads and worked behind square leg for a couple of runs
McKay to Raina, 1 run runs it to third man with an open face

McKay to Rohit Sharma, OUT McKay strikes again, India deep in trouble now, short of a length and getting big on Rohit, who has looked like getting out any moment, moves away just a bit after pitching and Rohit can only fend it to the keeper
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run moves across to a back of a length ball and works it through square leg
McKay to Raina, 1 run moves forward and eases the pitched up ball to sweeper cover
Christian to Raina, no run pushed away on the off side
Christian to Raina, no run pops up off a leading edge down the wicket as he looks to work on the leg side

Christian to Raina, OUT oh dear, Raina has fallen to the short ball, to Dan Christian, not the most threatening bowler going around, goes for an awkward pull, off the front foot, and only ends up lobbing the ball for midwicket to take a dolly running to his right

McKay to Jadeja, OUT another one goes! this would have been a six at most grounds in India, McKay banging it in short, Jadeja looks to pull it into the stands beyond deep midwicket but only gets it as far as the man in the deep who holds on as he tumbles to the ground
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length ball pops up off an inside edge but there is no one around square leg to take it

Doherty to Ashwin, 2 runs, OUT superb work in the deep from Christian, Ashwin hung his bat out to a wide and low full toss and got it through point, Christian chased and stopped it with a slide, looked back to see them attempting a third, and steadied himself before aiming at Ashwin's end, k

Starc to Praveen, 1 run dropped, well that spoils what could have been a perfect day for Australia, PK indulges in a upper cut that loops to Harris at third man, he gets around to it, and puts it down

Astonishing lack of fight from India after the rain break. They were on top for the first 10.4 overs, and then let it slip away completely, without a sniff of a fightback. All the resistance was from Australia's middle order, who drowned India's spinners in a blaze of frenetic running and power hit

That's it from us for the moment for this game. Read Brydon Coverdale's match report here. This is Abhishek Purohit signing off. Join us for the second ODI of the series, between India and Sri Lanka on Wednesday, from Perth. Cheers
Australia won by 65 runs (D/L method)
Player of the match is Matthew Wade, AUS
